biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.                    

                    

Tommy Campbell (born October 6, 1978) is a stand-up comedian, actor and writer. He is a dual-citizen of Ireland and Canada and currently resides in London, England. He spends most of his time acting, writing and performing stand-up around the world.
